phrases: Natsu's been trapped inside of an artificial dragon,
and is getting used as its power source!
Everyone wanted to try and rescue Natsu,
but Magnolia's facing a crisis, too!
The real show's just getting started, ya'll!
Bust this thing up, and me along with it!
But if we do that, what will happen to you, Natsu?
If Magnolia gets ruined'because of me,
I would not be able to sleep at night!
I heard a rumor while out on a job.
That someone was trying to make an artificial dragon...
And you secretly met with this fool?
She said that she was going to capture Natsu and use him as the dragon's power source.
And during the meeting, I heard it was indestructible,
but for a dragon slayer's power from the inside.
But if you had not handed Natsu over, that monstrosity would not have been able to activate, yes?
No, that was not the only reason.
Unless Natsu defeats her, the people in that city will not...
That idiot went and forgot the promise he made to the people in the city without sound!
The guy just does not know when to quit.
Sometimes I would go see how he was doing out on jobs.
But that idiot forgets everything else when he is thinking about Igneel!
but you must always remember your main role is that of a wizard of this guild.
I was not able to surpass Ul...
Natsu's the kind of guy who can surpass anything!
If he does not keep getting stronger...
Fighting him will not even be worth it!
I thought he would be able to destroy it easily.
I am going to give you the plan.
I saw it... I definitely saw it...
I would never seen anything so beautiful.
Since I never knew when I might meet one again...
I would just make one myself!
You are not the only one that wants to see dragons!
So do I, and Wendy, and Gajeel!
They laughed at me, ignored me...
You must know how painful it is, yes?
And now I have finally been able to unveil this!
Wow, that is some messed up backstory.
First I will crush this city,
and then fly around the entire continent!
I should have seen this coming...
I will give you the outlines of what really happened.
You are free to believe me or not.
I have got to at least stay conscious!
Come on, resisting any more is futile, I am telling you!
Do not you get what Daphne is saying?
It is about time to start, I see.
A promise as important as that?
I would expect that of him, but still!
There was not any other method.
But right now, our first priority is doing something about that big thing!
That is the owner of the cake shop!
He did not evacuate fast enough!
There are not no end to'them!
But at least I saved this...
You were welcoming a newcomer, yes?
I am not going to lose to a big thing like that.
Your magic power still has not...
Do not worry, I rested a little.
I am counting on you, Wendy.
I have only just joined Fairy Tail.
I have only just started pretty much everything...
But I want to laugh more with Natsu, with everyone...
Cry with everyone, get mad with everyone...
I want to high-five Natsu-san once again!
It is okay, she just lost consciousness.
But she is used up most of her magic power...
But Master told us to attack the Dragonoid...
Erza, Gramps gave me a secret plan...
You do not have to tell everyone.
The rest of you, eliminate the Lizardmen with everything you got!
I will take down the Dragonoid!
What is going to happen to Natsu?
This is the master's will, therefore it is Fairy Tail's will.
Protect this city, at all cost!
By the honor of our guild, our very soul!
I am a Fairy Tail wizard too, after all...
is not a problem at all...
This thing's weak point... what is it?
I have to save you, and yet...
This should be in that thing's blind spot.
The perfect place for a counterpunch.
This is the crucial moment to decide whether Natsu lives, or not.
I cannot imagine a Fairy Tail without Natsu!
My magic power's about at its limit!
It is been bothering me for a while, but I am sure now.
I have seen something like this before...
Or wait, I am going to destroy everything!
That big thing's absorbing Natsu's soul!
I am not sure why we can hear the whole thing...
Even now, he must still be affected by Nirvana...
We are done with that already!
We are going to cover for Erza, and crush all the grunts at once!
I felt it before when we faced each other,
but I think our magic power is very compatible.
As long as you believe in me, I am sure we can do it!
Will you lend me your power, Juvia?
I know the feeling of this magic power!
It is a Unison Raid of water and ice!
Do you think Gray and Juvia...
Gray-sama puts it all on the line for his friends...
That is one reason I have come to l... l...
You going to let him get away with stealing the juiciest scenes?!
We should just crush that guy!
I am gettin' so pissed right now!
Then why do not you crush this city, huh?
You are nothing but talk, squinty eyes!
How long are you going to stayed fused in that thing, doing your one-man stand up?
You forgot about the promise you made!
And you still call yourself a Fairy Tail wizard?!
Hurry up and destroy that dragon-thing!
So that is what you were after, Gray Fullbuster?
But it is already too late.
Because Salamander's magic power, and even most of his will itself, has been absorbed.
If I could destroy this, I would have done it by now!
Go crush that droopy eyes flat!
I am disappointed in you, Natsu!
Have not you gotten through every challenge before by destroying stuff?
I do not want to hear you say stuff like 34;Bust me up with it34;!
Everyone in Fairy Tail needs you!
That is why we are trying so hard!
A Natsu that does not respond to the feelings of his friends is not the Natsu I know!
When did I give up, exactly?!
You said 34;bust me up34;, if I recall.
That is the same as giving up!
It is nothing more than weakness!
So, just as you wish, I shall rid the world of this giant thing!
This has gotten kind of weird.
Natsu's soul has mostly fused with the Dragonoid!
The Lizardmen might be wiped out, but as long as I have this power...
Fairy Tail has no need for those who view their own life as insignificant!
I cannot imagine a prideful dragon ever wanting to see someone as weak-willed as you!
When you would leap to his breast to embrace him, he would smack you silly!
With this power, could not we beat Erza?
Today, finally, I will beat you!
He is pretty much saying exactly what he feels!
Hey, do not move on your own!
Nope, she is scary after all!
I are not kiddin' around here!
The magic power being absorbed is exceeding capacity!
What happened all of a sudden?
All you guys think you can get away with pushin' my buttons?!
I warned him and everything, you know.
Now the guy who is always hot under the collar has a body that is hot all over!
Looks like I still got a ways to go.
I was tryin' to pulverize the entire thing and bust you up with it.
Send all the fire ya got on an arrow in here!
Anyone who can use fire, lend a hand!
We just need to send fire to Natsu, right?
Thrust fire into that breast until he can eat no more!
We are counting on you, Sagittarius!
It cannot absorb any more magic power!
That stupid woman's insulted the pride and majesty of dragons.
Do not have to tell me twice.
Natsu, I will pay back my debt!
Now that I have eaten, I am all revved up!
That, itself, is the source of his greatest power.
Freeing himself, and standing up to adversity...
It is the motivational power he needed to break through it.
The best way was to make Natsu angry.
I told Gray to make Natsu angry.
And it looks like Erza figured it out without me saying anything.
A Fairy Tail wizard is ridding this city of evil!
You have really pissed me off now!
Go ahead, try and use one of those 34;Hidden34; techniques...
I am gettin' more power all the time here...
More than you can hide from with your magic!
In the end, the weak point of the Dragonoid...
You really did it this time!
It was your fault in the first place!
No matter how much we fight, no matter what happens,
all of us at Fairy Tail need each other.
We cannot lose even one, you know?
And that is while I will say it again: I love Fairy Tail!
When you smile, do not people say you look like a sunfish?
Natsu, tomorrow's finally the annual cherry blossom viewing!
But I need to finish up a request first.
I got to get Wendy used to work quick, see.
I am worried you guys are going to have a negative influence on Wendy.
Uh, can you put a little more trust in us, please?
I think her choice of teachers was a fundamental mistake.
